resume.name: Hamidreza Delshad
resume.profileText: As a Front-end and Full Stack Developer, I bring a strong blend of technical expertise and creative problem-solving skills. I have successfully developed responsive websites across diverse industries, focusing on creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. I thrive in cross-functional team environments and am committed to delivering innovative digital solutions for clients. I hold a bachelor’s degree in computer science.
resume.frontendText: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, Next.js, Redux Toolkit, React Query, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Material UI, Mantine, Ant Design
resume.backendText: Node.js, Express.js | Familiar: Python, C#, Java
resume.designText: Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Adobe XD
resume.signumDuty1: Designing components based on the Signum framework syntax.
resume.signumDuty2: Developing user interfaces, including custom tables, toolbars, and modules.
resume.signumDuty3: Implementing state management and data handling using React and TypeScript.
resume.signumDuty4: Collaborating with backend team to integrate APIs.
resume.signumDuty5: Conducting code reviews and participating in agile processes.
resume.hantverksDuty1: Built Time Flow — a time management tool using Next.js and TypeScript.
resume.hantverksDuty2: Created dynamic forms with React Hook Form and responsive layouts.
resume.hantverksDuty3: Used Jira for task coordination and collaborated with backend/UI teams.
resume.integrifyDuty1: Implemented 7+ websites with responsive, mobile-first design.
resume.integrifyDuty2: Assessed UI/UX feasibility in Figma and collaborated via GitHub & Slack.
resume.swedconDuty1: Worked on an online doctor appointment service using React, Next.js, Mantine.
resume.swedconDuty2: Improved project performance and maintained branding standards.
resume.kajutanDesc: Full-stack developer for a restaurant site with admin CRUD, search, and comment system.
resume.kajutanTech: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, JWT
resume.blogDesc: Next.js frontend with admin panel, user auth, search, comments, and moderation.
resume.blogTech: Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT, React Query
resume.jobDesc: Platform for job seekers and employers with role-based access and application management.
resume.jobTech: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, React Query
resume.bachelor: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
